Metadata.title: Kaloyan Stefanov - Full-Stack, AI, and Embedded Systems Developer
Metadata.description: I'm a developer with three years of experience, evolving from web and backend development to exploring Swift for mobile, and now innovating in AI and embedded systems with LangChain, Python, and STM32.
Metadata.author: Kaloyan Stefanov

Hero.label: Hello there!
Hero.title: I'm <name>Kaloyan</name>, a Full-Stack, AI, and Embedded Systems Developer.
Hero.subtitle: I became interested in programming three years ago, progressing from web and backend development to exploring Swift for mobile. I am now innovating in AI and embedded systems using LangChain, Python and STM32.
